titles.title: Farmer/Attorney Integrity Restoration Act of 1995
To amend the Legal Services Corporation Act to prohibit recipients of grants or contracts from the Legal Services Corporation from soliciting clients, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Commercial and Administrative Law.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 6/27/1995--Introduced. Farmer-Attorney Integrity Restoration Act of 1995 - Amends the Legal Services Corporation to prohibit recipients of Legal Services Corporation grants or contracts from entering private property to solicit clients, meet with individuals other than those who authorized entry onto the private property, or inspect for possible legal action to be brought against the owner of the private property.
